name: changesetting
desc: Escape the terminal and tweak the OS

success.reply: The `gsettings` tool just told you about a bunch of `commands`. You can access these commands by providing the command name as an argument to `gsettings`.

failure.reply: I thought that you were going to run `gsettings`?

list_schemas.task: Lets try listing all the categories, called `schemas` on your system.
